translation.en: [newsman] Some experts call it a retail apocalypse.
translation.zh: NETFLIX 原创纪录片 一些专家称之为零售商店的末日

translation.en: 2019 marked one of the worst years in a decade for brick-and-mortar stores.
translation.zh: 2019年几乎是实体店十年来最惨的一年

translation.en: [man] Less Is Now.
translation.zh: 《时机已到》

translation.en: [interviewer] Why do you think this idea of minimalism or simplifying
translation.zh: 你认为极简主义或简约主义这种概念

translation.en: is really catching on right now?
translation.zh: 为什么现在十分流行呢？

translation.en: I think it's because we have the opportunity to have so much. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我想这是因为我们现在有机会得到太多的东西了

translation.en: A portion of America's definitely addicted to stuff.
translation.zh: 一部分美国人确实对物品很是上瘾

translation.en: Probably not in the classic psychology sense of addiction.
translation.zh: 可能不是心理学上讲的那种成瘾心理

translation.en: We just love stuff!
translation.zh: 我们只是喜欢物品！

translation.en: Monday, today, is supposed to be the biggest online shopping day of all times,
translation.zh: 今天是周一应该是史上最大的网购节

translation.en: reaching around three-and-a-third billion dollars in online sales.
translation.zh: 网上交易额达到了近33亿美元

translation.en: Anything that you can think of, you can get on your doorstep,
translation.zh: 只要是你能想到的东西现在都可以在24小时之内

translation.en: now within 24 hours.
translation.zh: 送货上门

translation.en: That's… That's almost like magic, right?
translation.zh: 简直就像魔法了 对吧？

translation.en: When you look up at the sky, you may soon see Amazon's army of new-age deliveries.
translation.zh: 当你抬头仰望天空 你可能很快就能看到亚马逊的新时代快递大军

translation.en: [newswoman] The electronic aircraft would have a 15-mile range
translation.zh: 这种小型电子飞机飞行航程约为24千米

translation.en: and deliver packages within 30 minutes.
translation.zh: 可在30分钟内将包裹送达

translation.en: [man] The consumer world understands that if I can get you to choose before you think,
translation.zh: 在消费者世界里你要明白如果我能让你不假思索地选择商品

translation.en: I'm gonna get you to buy things you do not need.
translation.zh: 那么我就可以让你买一些你并不需要的物品

translation.en: My senses are just being bombarded with reminders,
translation.zh: 我的感官被各种提示轮番轰炸

translation.en: like, "Hey, you should buy this.
translation.zh: 比如：“嗨 你应该买这个买了它你会更加幸福”

translation.en: You'd be happier if you buy this." You know?
translation.zh: 比如：“嗨 你应该买这个买了它你会更加幸福” 你知道吗？

translation.en: [laughing] And it's just sort of like, in so many ways,
translation.zh: 在很多方面 这就好像

translation.en: they're trying to beat you into submission.
translation.zh: 他们就是试图让你屈服

translation.en: "Okay, I'll buy it! I need it! I need it!"
translation.zh: “好吧 我要买！我需要！”

translation.en: Amazon, hiring once again.
translation.zh: 亚马逊再次进行招聘

translation.en: The company looking to recruit 100,000 workers
translation.zh: 此次计划招聘十万名员工

translation.en: to meet surging levels of e-commerce demand.
translation.zh: 来应对激增的网商需求

translation.en: Lots of smaller retail businesses are being lost,
translation.zh: 许多小型零售产业正在消失

translation.en: and the power is being consolidated in the hands of these giants.
translation.zh: 权利在这些电子巨头手中巩固

translation.en: Stuff is contributing to our discontent in so many different ways,
translation.zh: 物品以很多不同的方式在慢慢增加我们的不满

translation.en: because it's taking the place
translation.zh: 因为它取代了

translation.en: of the things that actually do give us more happiness.
translation.zh: 本该真正给我们带来更多幸福感的东西

translation.en: I found minimalism about seven years ago in the midst of a breakdown.
translation.zh: 大约七年前 我在一次崩溃的时候发现了极简主义

translation.en: I was overworked. Um, I was exhausted. I was heavily stressed out.
translation.zh: 我那时过度工作、非常疲惫压力过大 难以承受

translation.en: There has to be more to life than just working.
translation.zh: 生活不能只由工作构成

translation.en: I think immediately I got up, and I went to my closet,
translation.zh: 我立马起身走向我的衣柜

translation.en: and I started pulling my clothes out.
translation.zh: 我开始把我的衣服翻出来

translation.en: Uh, I stayed up until 3:00 a.m., and I just packed so many things.
translation.zh: 我熬到凌晨三点 打包了很多东西

translation.en: [woman] As I started slowly releasing things, I gained a sense of freedom.
translation.zh: 当我开始慢慢扔掉一些东西我获得了一种自由感

translation.en: [woman 2] Change is definitely coming. Change is inevitable,
translation.zh: 改变必定会发生 改变是不可避免的因为你不能持续消费

translation.en: because you can't continue to consume
translation.zh: 改变是不可避免的因为你不能持续消费

translation.en: more than the planet can replenish every year.
translation.zh: 超过地球每年可以产生的量

translation.en: You just physically can't.
translation.zh: 从根本上就是不可能的

translation.en: So the question is not if we are gonna change as a society,
translation.zh: 因此我们的问题不是作为社会的一员我们是否要改变

translation.en: but how we are gonna change.
translation.zh: 而是我们要如何改变

translation.en: 'Cause we're either gonna change by design or by disaster.
translation.zh: 因为我们要么有意去改变不然就会通过灾难改变

translation.en: It all started with one question.
translation.zh: 一切都始于一个问题

translation.en: How might your life be better with less?
translation.zh: 从简 你的生活能怎样变得更好？

translation.en: -[man] Want some tea? -[woman] Sure.
translation.zh: -要来杯茶吗？-好

translation.en: [man] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: [woman] It's in the… Yeah. Okay.
translation.zh: 在那里面…对 好的

translation.en: [man] Yeah, y-you know, I mean, aesthetics are important to me,
translation.zh: 我是想说 我很注重美观

translation.en: but what I care most about is having a place free of clutter.
translation.zh: 但我最看重的是所处之地没有杂物

translation.en: So when you look around my place,
translation.zh: 当你环顾我的住所

translation.en: not everything is necessarily minimalist design.
translation.zh: 并不是所有物品都是极简设计

translation.en: I don't go out of my way to specifically have only minimalist aesthetics.
translation.zh: 我并没有特意去追求极简主义的美观

translation.en: But to me, it's… it's clutter-free.
translation.zh: 但对我来说 这种设计很简洁

translation.en: We often confuse simplicity with easy, but it's actually the exact opposite.
translation.zh: 我们常把简约和简单搞混事实上 两者完全相反

translation.en: Living a simple life, it takes a lot of work.
translation.zh: 过一个简约的生活 这需要很大努力

translation.en: It takes a lot of work to be intentional. What's easy is going with the flow.
translation.zh: 简约需要努力去刻意保持而简单只需要随波逐流

translation.en: It's going out, and going to IKEA, and buying the cheap furniture
translation.zh: 每当你认为需要一件家具或一张茶几时

translation.en: every time you think you need a piece of furniture or an end table.
translation.zh: 就去宜家买便宜的家具

translation.en: It is very difficult to go through some of these stoical experiments
translation.zh: 经历这种控制欲望的试验来看自己的生活

translation.en: to see what you can live with or live without,
translation.zh: 到底需要什么、不需要什么是非常难的

translation.en: but, in the end, it's worth the work.
translation.zh: 但最后 这一切都是值得的

translation.en: [host] People go, "Check out this documentary.
translation.zh: 人们会说：“去看这部纪录片这群极简主义者…”

translation.en: -These guys, The Minimalists." -[hosts 2] The Minimalists.
translation.zh: 人们会说：“去看这部纪录片这群极简主义者…” 极简主义者

translation.en: [host 3] The Minimalists are with us. Joshua and Ryan.
translation.zh: 极简主义者就在我们周围乔休尔和瑞恩

translation.en: [TV journalist] They have books, a podcast, and a Netflix documentary,
translation.zh: 有很多书籍、播客和Netflix的纪录片

translation.en: all guiding typical consumers on how to downsize their way to happiness.
translation.zh: 来指导典型的消费者如何在前往幸福的路上减负

translation.en: [Ryan] I don't think you can understand how Josh and I came to be minimalists
translation.zh: 如果不看我们的成长经历我不认为你们能真正理解

translation.en: without looking at our upbringings.
translation.zh: 乔休和我是如何成为极简主义者的

translation.en: Both of us grew up poor.
translation.zh: 我们小时候家里都很穷

translation.en: Our moms had issues with substance abuse, and we really never had enough.
translation.zh: 我们妈妈从不奢侈浪费事实上 我们都没有足够的东西

translation.en: Dude, look at this. This is hilarious.
translation.zh: 兄弟 看看这个 这个真搞笑

translation.en: Even our furniture. [chuckling] It was like… It was like do-it-yourself furniture.
translation.zh: 我们的家具 都是自己动手做的

translation.en: That's like our cupboard in the kitchen.
translation.zh: 这是我们厨房里的碗柜

translation.en: I was really a happy kid up until, uh, about the second grade
translation.zh: 在我二年级的时候父母离婚了

translation.en: when my parents got divorced.
translation.zh: 在那之前我一直是个幸福的小孩

translation.en: It happens to a lot of kids, their parents get divorced.
translation.zh: 很多孩子都会经历父母离婚的事情

translation.en: But I remember things really getting dysfunctional when…
translation.zh: 但我记得当妈妈离开爸爸的时候

translation.en: uh, when my mom left my dad.
translation.zh: 一切都偏离了正轨

translation.en: And there was just a lot of…
translation.zh: 就有很多…

translation.en: a lot of partying, I remember.
translation.zh: 我记得有很多派对

translation.en: And, um, you know, as a kid, it looked like a lot of fun.
translation.zh: 你知道 作为一个孩子派对看起来极其有趣

translation.en: My mom did a good job of making it look fun.
translation.zh: 我妈妈在让派对变得有趣方面颇有造诣

translation.en: I met Josh in the fifth grade when I moved to his middle school.
translation.zh: 我在五年级的时候遇到了乔休那时我转学到了他的中学

translation.en: [Ryan] It could have been that we were both from broken homes and didn't have much money growing up,
translation.zh: 可能是因为我们都来自单亲家庭并且都没什么钱

translation.en: or maybe it was that we were the two fattest kids in our grade,
translation.zh: 也可能是因为我们是整个年级最胖的两个小孩

translation.en: but we just hit it off, and we became best friends.
translation.zh: 我们相处得很好 成为了最好的朋友

translation.en: [Joshua] When we were growing up, I feel like we could've used minimalism,
translation.zh: 当我们长大了我真的感觉可以开始遵行极简主义

translation.en: because minimalism is basically the intentional use of resources you have,
translation.zh: 因为极简主义其实就是 有意地去使用你仅有的资源

translation.en: and if you have very few resources, like we did growing up,
translation.zh: 如果你拥有很少的资源就像我们成长过程中一样

translation.en: man, we could've done much better by being more deliberate with those resources.
translation.zh: 经过深思熟虑我们可以更好地利用这些资源

translation.en: It's interesting, because when you're poor,
translation.zh: 有趣的是 当你贫穷的时候

translation.en: it's like, when someone offers you something, you take it.
translation.zh: 别人给你什么东西 你都会收下

translation.en: I-I think about my household growing up, and we had so much stuff,
translation.zh: 随着我们家庭日子一天天过下去我们积累了太多物品

translation.en: because we took every single thing that was offered to us.
translation.zh: 因为不论谁给我们东西我们都会收下

translation.en: However, we had a lot of stuff that we didn't need.
translation.zh: 但是 我们有太多不需要的东西了

translation.en: In fact, it was just clutter, and it did not add any value.
translation.zh: 事实上 这种东西就叫杂物没有任何的附加价值

translation.en: As we get more space, we fill it with more things.
translation.zh: 随着我们房子空间的增加我们用更多的东西填满

translation.en: As we get more things, we need more space,
translation.zh: 拥有了更多的东西我们又需要更大的空间

translation.en: so we turn to storage lockers, or we turn to bigger houses.
translation.zh: 因此我们开始用更大的储物柜甚至搬进更大的房子

translation.en: And we never really stop to question, "What is essential? What is necessary?"
translation.zh: 我们从未停下脚步问一问：“哪些必不可少？哪些是需要的？”

translation.en: Then, "How much of the stuff is actually adding any value to my life at all?"
translation.zh: 还有“这些物品为我的生活增加了多少价值？”

translation.en: A decade ago,
translation.zh: 十年前

translation.en: by the time I was 28 years old, I had achieved everything I ever wanted.
translation.zh: 我28岁的时候实现了之前我想要的一切

translation.en: I was the youngest director in my company's 140-year history,
translation.zh: 我是公司140年历史上最年轻的董事

translation.en: and I had all the fringe benefits of a middle manager at a major corporation.
translation.zh: 我还获得了一家大公司中层经理的所有福利待遇

translation.en: The luxury cars, the closet filled with designer clothes,
translation.zh: 豪车、装满名牌服装的衣橱

translation.en: the big suburban house with more toilets than people.
translation.zh: 郊区的大别墅比人数还多的厕所数量

translation.en: I guess you could say I was living the American dream.
translation.zh: 你大概可以说我就过着别人的美国梦

translation.en: But then, my mom died…
translation.zh: 但后来 我妈妈去世了…

translation.en: and my marriage ended…
translation.zh: 我的婚姻也结束了

translation.en: both in the same month.
translation.zh: 两件事发生在同一个月

translation.en: And these two events forced me to look around
translation.zh: 这两件事迫使我环顾四周

translation.en: and start to question what had become my life's focus.
translation.zh: 开始质问自己 什么是我生活的重点

translation.en: You know what I realized?
translation.zh: 你猜我意识到了什么？

translation.en: I realized I was so focused on so-called success, and achievement,
translation.zh: 我意识到我太注重于所谓的功成名就了

translation.en: and especially on the accumulation of stuff.
translation.zh: 特别是物质上的积累

translation.en: I might have been living the American dream,
translation.zh: 我之前可能过着别人的美国梦

translation.en: but it wasn't my dream.
translation.zh: 但那不是我的梦想

translation.en: It took getting everything I thought I wanted
translation.zh: 我费尽心机 得到了想要的一切之后

translation.en: to realize that maybe everything I ever wanted
translation.zh: 才意识到 可能之前想要的一切

translation.en: wasn't actually what I wanted at all.
translation.zh: 根本不是我真正想要拥有的

translation.en: [woman] Corporations and the drive for corporate profit
translation.zh: 企业和企业利润的驱动

translation.en: is absolutely behind the addiction to stuff that we have in this country.
translation.zh: 绝对是美国对东西上瘾这一事件的幕后推手

translation.en: The way corporations are structured in this country
translation.zh: 这个国家的企业构造方式

translation.en: is they really need to keep growing.
translation.zh: 就是需要不断的增长

translation.en: A corporation's primary obligation is to their shareholders,
translation.zh: 企业的首要义务就是给股东利润

translation.en: to which they have to keep delivering increased revenue,
translation.zh: 因此企业就需要持续增加收入

translation.en: and that's sort of the foundation of capitalism, growth.
translation.zh: 这也就是资本主义的基础 增长

translation.en: I-I don't think the problem has much to do with how much we're growing,
translation.zh: 我不认为这个问题与我们增长程度的大小有多大关系

translation.en: but rather how we answer the question of "where are we going?"
translation.zh: 而是与我们如何回答“我们要走向哪里”有关

translation.en: I think one of the biggest problems we have in our world now
translation.zh: 当今世界我们所面临的最大困难之一

translation.en: is that people really aren't free to choose.
translation.zh: 就是人们没有真正的选择自由

translation.en: We talk about being in a free market
translation.zh: 我们谈论自由市场或自由社会

translation.en: or a free society, but people aren't really free to choose.
translation.zh: 我们谈论自由市场或自由社会 但人们无法真正的自由选择

translation.en: Because you just have one or two large institutions
translation.zh: 因为只有一两家大型机构

translation.en: that have these artificial monopolies,
translation.zh: 形成人为的垄断

translation.en: and they get to decide for everyone
translation.zh: 他们会帮所有人做出选择

translation.en: what you can watch, what you can listen to.
translation.zh: 你能看什么 你能听什么

translation.en: And so, manipulation of… of our interests,
translation.zh: 从而操控我们的兴趣

translation.en: manipulation of our natural, God-given taste really is happening.
translation.zh: 操控我们自然的、上天赐予的品味正在上演

translation.en: [man] Marketers are really impressive in their ability to manipulate the mind,
translation.zh: 营销商操控消费者大脑的能力

translation.en: in their ability to create a need or a perceived need
translation.zh: 创造消费者需求或是把想要的东西

translation.en: out of something that was a want.
translation.zh: 变为潜在需求的能力登峰造极

translation.en: We live in the most advertised-to culture in the history of the world.
translation.zh: 我们生活在世界历史上接触广告最多的文化中

translation.en: Hundreds of millions of dollars are spent telling us we need this,
translation.zh: 想一想 商家花了数亿美元只是为了告诉我们 我们需要这个

translation.en: and it has an effect.
translation.zh: 并且很有效果

translation.en: [Joshua] The money spent on advertising in the United States
translation.zh: 美国花在广告上的费用

translation.en: has increased from just over $5 billion in the 1950s to $240 billion a year today.
translation.zh: 从20世纪50年代的每年50多亿美元增长到了现在的2400亿美元

translation.en: And since the turn of the 21st century,
translation.zh: 自21世纪初以来

translation.en: much of that spending has moved from television and radio
translation.zh: 大部分支出从电视和广播

translation.en: to digital advertising.
translation.zh: 转向了数字广告

translation.en: The result, intelligent and predictive ads
translation.zh: 结果表明 智能广告和预测性广告

translation.en: that seem to know us better than we know ourselves.
translation.zh: 似乎比我们还要了解自己

translation.en: Companies have figured out how to stitch our devices together,
translation.zh: 公司已经找到了将我们的通讯设备连在一起的方法

translation.en: so they know when you pick up your tablet or switch to your smartphone,
translation.zh: 因此当你拿起平板电脑或者换用智能手机

translation.en: when you change the channel on your TV
translation.zh: 切换电视频道

translation.en: or speak to your smart device.
translation.zh: 对智能设备发出指令 他们都知道

translation.en: Using the GPS on your devices, they can track your movement
translation.zh: 在设备上使用导航 他们可以追踪到你的动向查看你经过了哪些广告牌

translation.en: to see which billboards you pass,
translation.zh: 他们可以追踪到你的动向查看你经过了哪些广告牌

translation.en: which stores you frequent,
translation.zh: 常去哪些商店

translation.en: and even the amount of credit card debt you've racked up.
translation.zh: 甚至是你积累下的信用卡债务

translation.en: They map these movements to know when it's the perfect time to message you next.
translation.zh: 他们掌握你的动向后就知道何时是给你发信息的最佳时机

translation.en: And the end goal is always the same. To get you to buy more stuff.
translation.zh: 但最终目的是相同的：让你购买更多的物品

translation.en: And one of the tricks they use is what we call deficit advertising.
translation.zh: 广告商使用的伎俩之一就是我们所说的赤字广告

translation.en: They send us advertisements
translation.zh: 他们给我们发送的广告

translation.en: that make us subconsciously feel like we are inadequate, um,
translation.zh: 让我们在潜意识里认为如果没有这个产品

translation.en: if we don't have this product.
translation.zh: 我们就缺点什么

translation.en: So, "I will not be loved if I don't have this toothpaste."
translation.zh: 就会产生这种想法“如果没有这支牙膏 我就不会被爱了”

translation.en: "My children will not value me if I don't have this dish soap."
translation.zh: “如果我不用这款洗洁精我的孩子就不会尊重我”

translation.en: Everyone's gonna want this.
translation.zh: 每个人都想拥有这个

translation.en: It's no different than the premise of working out at a gym.
translation.zh: 这和在健身房锻炼没什么不同

translation.en: It's the massaging hand sauna.
translation.zh: 这是按摩性手部桑拿

translation.en: -[woman] This is gonna make you thirsty. -A perfect set for every occasion.
translation.zh: -你会非常渴望这个的-这套杯具适用于任何场合

translation.en: -You can feel it, you can see it. -[muffled] You can totally feel it.
translation.zh: -你能感觉得到 你也可以看得到-你完全可以感觉到 是的

translation.en: [Annie] This bombardment of messages that we are not enough.
translation.zh: 这些说我们所拥有的远远不够的信息轰炸

translation.en: So think about what that does to people, just every day,
translation.zh: 想想这些广告每天对人们的影响

translation.en: over and over, getting messages, "You are not enough.
translation.zh: 一遍又一遍地发送 接收“你还远远不够

translation.en: Your hair, your clothes, your skin, your body is not enough."
translation.zh: 你的头发、衣服、皮肤、身体都远远不够”

translation.en: Just relentless. So then we want to go be enough.
translation.zh: 持续不断轰炸然后我们就会想要变得满足了

translation.en: And because we've lost these other ways of being enough…
translation.zh: 因为我们已经失去了获得满足的其他方式…

translation.en: The other ways of being enough are having a community, having a purpose,
translation.zh: 其他获得满足的方式有很多比如拥有一个小群体、有一个目标

translation.en: you know, having an identity besides the brand on you.
translation.zh: 还需要除了身上的名牌以外有一个自己的身份

translation.en: Because we've lost those, we misplace our desire for belonging and satisfaction
translation.zh: 因为我们失去了这些 我们把归属感和满足感用错了地方

translation.en: by buying more stuff.
translation.zh: 用在了购买更多物品上

translation.en: We don't really say, "Okay, I'm gonna turn stuff into my idol."
translation.zh: 我们不会说：“好吧我要把物品当成我的崇拜对象”

translation.en: We don't say that in our intellect. No one intentionally does that.
translation.zh: 以我们的智力来说没有人会有意识地说出这样的话

translation.en: But we can tell by our behaviors that that's actually what we've done.
translation.zh: 但是通过我们的所作所为可以看出我们就是那样做的

translation.en: Because you know, if you're saying to yourself, "Well, if I just had that car, I'd be happy then.
translation.zh: 如果你对自己说：“如果我拥有了这辆车 我就会幸福了

translation.en: If I just lived in that house, I'd be happy then. If we moved to that neighborhood, we'd be happy.
translation.zh: 如果我搬进那个房子里 如果我住在这个街区里 我就会幸福了

translation.en: If I had that couch or those new drapes, I'd be happy then."
translation.zh: 如果我拥有那个沙发 那些新窗帘我就会幸福了”

translation.en: And that means that you're worshiping at the altar of stuff.
translation.zh: 这就意味着你把物品摆在了祭拜的圣坛上

translation.en: You have officially contracted the disease of "stuffitis."
translation.zh: 你也正式患上了“物质沉迷”病

translation.en: And so, it becomes a spiritual thing then,
translation.zh: 然后它就变成了一种精神上的东西

translation.en: because it's in competition with the things that really matter.
translation.zh: 因为它在与那些真正重要的东西竞争

translation.en: [T.K.] Everybody's selling something.
translation.zh: 每个人都会卖东西

translation.en: And that doesn't mean that… that selling is always bad. It's okay.
translation.zh: 这不意味着卖东西本身总是不好的本身是没问题的

translation.en: I want my grocery store to sell things that I can go buy.
translation.zh: 我希望杂货店可以卖东西我才能够去买

translation.en: I want to be able to buy food, right? So I want them to sell that to me.
translation.zh: 我想要能够买到食物 对吧？因此我希望他们卖那些东西给我

translation.en: It's not about looking at people and condemning them for having an angle,
translation.zh: 不是说让你看着别人谴责她们有意地去卖东西

translation.en: or for having something they're marketing,
translation.zh: 或是谴责她们在营销什么东西

translation.en: or for having a product that they're pushing.
translation.zh: 或谴责她们力推了什么产品

translation.en: It's… It's making sure you understand
translation.zh: 你要确保自己知道

translation.en: that what other people are pushing is not always consistent.
translation.zh: 别人所推销的不总是符合你的需求

translation.en: It's not always compatible with what it is you need.
translation.zh: 也不总是你一定需要的

translation.en: My shopping habits before minimalism were compulsive.
translation.zh: 在实行极简主义之前我的购物习惯一向都是强迫性的

translation.en: I was spending money, and it was out of control.
translation.zh: 我不停地花钱 完全失控了

translation.en: Shopping was a crutch. It was a place I would go to.
translation.zh: 购物是我的精神支柱是我发泄的方式

translation.en: Some people like to emotionally eat. I would emotionally shop.
translation.zh: 一些人喜欢情绪性暴食而我会情绪性疯狂购物

translation.en: I was all about the deal.
translation.zh: 我一心就想着怎么买划算

translation.en: So I was all about, um, finding, you know, that 99% off item
translation.zh: 我就疯狂寻找打0.1折的商品

translation.en: that I could get, you know, for a huge discount.
translation.zh: 我可以享有很大的折扣

translation.en: I would most likely buy that item thinking this was the only chance I would get.
translation.zh: 我买东西的时候就会想错过这个村 就没有这个店了

translation.en: I would have, uh, nail clippers.
translation.zh: 我买指甲刀时

translation.en: I would buy fancy ones, normal ones, regular ones, you know.
translation.zh: 我会买时尚款、普通款、常规款

translation.en: Ones that had a different little thing to go on it.
translation.zh: 就是上面总有些不一样小点缀的款式

translation.en: I would buy just random stuff like that,
translation.zh: 我会随性地买很多这样的东西

translation.en: and then I would realize, like, I'm wasting my money on things that I already have.
translation.zh: 然后我就意识到我在已经拥有的东西上浪费了钱

translation.en: I bought a scooter. A 150 cc scooter.
translation.zh: 我买了一辆小型摩托车一辆150排量的摩托车

translation.en: I thought somehow that would change my life.
translation.zh: 我想这可能会改变我的生活

translation.en: I could imagine myself riding this in Atlanta.
translation.zh: 我可以想象自己在亚特兰大骑着它

translation.en: And if you've ever been in Atlanta traffic,
translation.zh: 如果你曾经经历过亚特兰大的交通情况

translation.en: the last thing you want to be doing is riding on a scooter.
translation.zh: 你最不想做的事就是骑一辆小型摩托车

translation.en: I felt like I deserved it. I felt like I worked really hard,
translation.zh: 我认为这是我值得拥有它我感觉自己工作很努力

translation.en: and these beautiful items would show up and make me so happy.
translation.zh: 这些漂亮商品出现在我身边会让我感到很幸福

translation.en: And then the feeling of shame would creep up and guilt,
translation.zh: 但随之而来的则是羞耻感和罪恶感

translation.en: and the bills would show up, um, and I… It was just a… a bad cycle.
translation.zh: 接着账单就会出现这是一个恶性循环

translation.en: [Joshua] You know, it's strange in retrospect,
translation.zh: 回想起来有些奇怪

translation.en: but I didn't realize we were poor when I was a kid.
translation.zh: 在我小时候 我并不知道我们很穷

translation.en: We were on food stamps and government assistance,
translation.zh: 我们依靠食品券和政府援助生活

translation.en: but that seemed totally normal to me.
translation.zh: 但这对于我来说再正常不过了

translation.en: Poverty was sort of like oxygen.
translation.zh: 贫穷有点像是氧气

translation.en: It was all around me, but I couldn't see it.
translation.zh: 它围绕着我 我却看不到

translation.en: It was just there.
translation.zh: 它就在那里存在

translation.en: Shortly after I was born, my father's mental health took a turn for the worse,
translation.zh: 我出生后不久 我父亲的心理健康状况开始恶化

translation.en: and that's when everything started to change.
translation.zh: 这时 一切开始发生变化

translation.en: You see, when Mom married my dad,
translation.zh: 当我母亲嫁给父亲的时候

translation.en: she didn't realize he suffered from manic depression and schizophrenia,
translation.zh: 她不知道他患有躁郁症和精神分裂症

translation.en: but she found out pretty quickly.
translation.zh: 但她很快就发现了

translation.en: And Dad's mental illness was only amplified by his alcoholism,
translation.zh: 父亲的精神疾病因为酗酒变得更加严重了

translation.en: which made him mean, and aggressive, and completely unpredictable.
translation.zh: 他变得刻薄、激进而且完全不可预测

translation.en: I guess the physical abuse started around the time I was three years old.
translation.zh: 我想身体上的虐待大概开始于我三岁的时候

translation.en: In fact, my very first memory as a child
translation.zh: 其实 我儿时的第一个记忆

translation.en: is of my father extinguishing a cigarette on my mom's bare chest.
translation.zh: 就是我爸爸将香烟按在妈妈裸露的胸上熄灭

translation.en: Things only got worse from there, until, eventually, we escaped.
translation.zh: 从那之后 情况变得越来越糟最后 我们逃走了

translation.en: Mom and I moved 20 miles south to a suburb of Dayton,
translation.zh: 我和妈妈搬到约32千米以南的代顿郊区

translation.en: which sounds nice, right?
translation.zh: 听起来很美好 对吧？

translation.en: The suburbs!
translation.zh: 那可是郊区！

translation.en: But it wasn't really nice at all.
translation.zh: 但事实上一点都不美好

translation.en: It's gonna be right up here on the right.
translation.zh: 就在前面的右边

translation.en: You see that green house right there? That's it.
translation.zh: 你看到那里的绿房子了吧？就是那个

translation.en: -[turn signal clicking] -Oh, man.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Look at that.
translation.zh: 看那里

translation.en: It's all boarded up, and it has, like, this wrap on her.
translation.zh: 房子用木板钉上了外面紧紧裹了一层

translation.en: -[car door opens] -[Joshua] Wanna take a look?
translation.zh: 想看一看吗？

translation.en: We lived in a house that was literally falling apart.
translation.zh: 我们住的房子 真的是摇摇欲坠

translation.en: The rent was $200 a month.
translation.zh: 租金是每月200美元

translation.en: Our home always smelled faintly of empty beer cans and stale cigarette smoke.
translation.zh: 我们家里总能隐约闻到空啤酒罐和发霉香烟的味道

translation.en: I can still smell it now.
translation.zh: 现在我依然能闻到

translation.en: Cockroaches scattered every time I turned on the kitchen light.
translation.zh: 我每次一打开厨房的灯蟑螂就四处逃窜

translation.en: And whenever the power got shut off,
translation.zh: 而当电源被切断

translation.en: we'd run an extension cord from next door to keep the TV glowing.
translation.zh: 我们会从隔壁接上一根电线让电视机一直亮着

translation.en: Here's the front door here.
translation.zh: 前门在这里

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 靠

translation.en: It looks like they might have squatters. It's totally falling apart.
translation.zh: 看起来可能有擅自占用房屋的人了这房子都要塌了

translation.en: So when we first moved down here, I know we signed up for food stamps.
translation.zh: 我们第一次搬到这里时我知道我们申请了食品券

translation.en: As a kid, I didn't know the difference between the white and green money we had,
translation.zh: 我当时还是一个孩子我不知道白色的钱和绿色的钱的区别

translation.en: because the food stamps were these white bills,
translation.zh: 因为食品券就是这些白色的钱

translation.en: and then, you know, green money was just… just money, right?
translation.zh: 绿色的 你知道的就是普通的钱 对吧？

translation.en: And she would trade the…
translation.zh: 她会用…

translation.en: She would trade the white bills…
translation.zh: 她会用这些白色的钱交换…

translation.en: for the green bills, 'cause you needed the green bills to buy alcohol.
translation.zh: 绿色的钞票因为买酒需要这些绿色的钞票

translation.en: And so, she'd buy whatever beer was cheapest.
translation.zh: 她会买最便宜的酒

translation.en: You know, Milwaukee's Best or the bottom-shelf bottles of wine.
translation.zh: 密尔沃基之最啤酒或是架子最底层最便宜的红酒

translation.en: I'd come home each day from school… I was about six.
translation.zh: 我每天放学回家… 我那时大概六岁

translation.en: I would find Mom just passed out on the couch day after day after day.
translation.zh: 都会发现妈妈昏倒在沙发上每一天都如此

translation.en: It became this normal occurrence and…
translation.zh: 变成了日常情况

translation.en: I feel like I didn't realize it at the time,
translation.zh: 我想 我当时还没有意识到

translation.en: but I kind of thought it was… kind of thought it was my fault, you know.
translation.zh: 但我总觉得…觉得这是我的错

translation.en: As things started unraveling, Mom's drinking got worse.
translation.zh: 随着事态的发展 妈妈酗酒更严重了

translation.en: Now don't get me wrong, my mom was a good person with a good heart
translation.zh: 不要误解 我妈妈是个好人 很善良

translation.en: and a hilarious sense of humor.
translation.zh: 并且还有令人捧腹的幽默感

translation.en: Somewhere along the way, she'd simply lost a sense of meaning in her life.
translation.zh: 但在生命旅途中某个时候她失去了活着的意义

translation.en: And I knew the only way for me to break the cycle,
translation.zh: 我知道打破这个恶性循环的唯一方法

translation.en: the only way for me to find the meaning that she'd lost,
translation.zh: 唯一方法就是我来找到她丢失的活着的意义

translation.en: was to make a lot of money when I grew up.
translation.zh: 那就是我长大后要赚大钱

translation.en: I remember back when I was a teenager,
translation.zh: 我记得我十几岁的时候

translation.en: I spent most of my summers working for my dad,
translation.zh: 我大部分的暑假都在为我爸爸打工

translation.en: painting and hanging wallpaper.
translation.zh: 刷墙和粘墙纸

translation.en: And you should have seen some of the houses we worked in.
translation.zh: 你应该看看我们工作过的一些房子

translation.en: Some of them were unbelievably fancy.
translation.zh: 其中一些是难以置信的豪华

translation.en: Ten thousand square foot garages, indoor swimming pools, private bowling alleys.
translation.zh: 九百多平的车库、室内游泳池私人保龄球球道

translation.en: Nothing I aspired to own myself, but it was pretty impressive.
translation.zh: 没有什么是我立志想要自己拥有的但是让我印象深刻

translation.en: And then, one day, we started to work on this really, really nice house.
translation.zh: 然后有一天 我们开始在一个非常非常漂亮的房子里工作

translation.en: It wasn't like a multi-million-dollar nice house,
translation.zh: 它不像那种一座价值数百万美元的漂亮房子

translation.en: but it was something nicer than my mom or dad had ever owned.
translation.zh: 但它比我父母拥有过的任何房子都要好

translation.en: The walls in their home,
translation.zh: 他们家里的墙壁

translation.en: they were decorated with the smiling faces of friends and family
translation.zh: 用朋友和家人的笑脸装饰着

translation.en: that affirmed the happiness in their lives.
translation.zh: 证明着他们生活的幸福

translation.en: And the stuff in their home, it filled every nook and cranny.
translation.zh: 而他们家里的东西填满了每一个角落和缝隙

translation.en: I pictured myself living there.
translation.zh: 我想象着自己住在这里

translation.en: I pictured how happy I would be if I could just own a house like that,
translation.zh: 我想象着如果自己拥有这样的房子我会有多么开心

translation.en: filled with all that stuff.
translation.zh: 物品充斥着每个角落

translation.en: So, I turned to my dad and I asked him,
translation.zh: 于是我转向我爸爸 问他

translation.en: "How much do I need to make in order to own a house like this?"
translation.zh: “我需要赚多少钱才能拥有这样一栋房子？”

translation.en: He looked at me and he said, "Son, if you can make $50,000 a year,
translation.zh: 他看着我说：“儿子如果你一年能赚五万美元

translation.en: you could probably afford a place like this."
translation.zh: 你或许就可以拥有这样的一栋房子”

translation.en: So that became my benchmark. $50,000.
translation.zh: 因此这就成了我的目标 五万美元

translation.en: Then, during my senior year of high school,
translation.zh: 在我高中的最后一年

translation.en: Josh and I, we were sitting at the lonely lunchroom table together,
translation.zh: 乔休和我一起坐在寂寞的午餐桌旁

translation.en: and we started to talk about what we were going to do with our lives after we graduated.
translation.zh: 我们开始讨论毕业后要做什么

translation.en: So I told him, "I don't know what I'm going to do,
translation.zh: 我跟他说：“我不知道自己要做什么

translation.en: but if I can find a way to make $50,000 a year,
translation.zh: 但是如果我可以找到一种方式一年赚五万美元

translation.en: I know that I'll be happy."
translation.zh: 那么我一定会很幸福”

translation.en: So that's what I went and did. That's what Josh went and did.
translation.zh: 因此这就是我和乔休去做的

translation.en: We got sales jobs and we started earning 50 grand.
translation.zh: 我们开始了销售工作开始赚五万美元

translation.en: But something went wrong.
translation.zh: 但是情况有些不对

translation.en: I wasn't happy. I had to go back to the drawing board.
translation.zh: 我并不开心 我需要重新开始

translation.en: And thank goodness, I found out what had happened.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 我最终知道了到底哪里出了问题

translation.en: I forgot to adjust for inflation.
translation.zh: 我忘了根据通货膨胀 来调整金额

translation.en: So I thought to myself,
translation.zh: 因此我心想

translation.en: "Well, maybe $65,000 a year, maybe that was happiness.
translation.zh: “好吧 可能一年赚6.5万美元我会感到幸福

translation.en: Or maybe 90,000, or maybe six figures,
translation.zh: 或者是一年赚九万美元 或是六位数

translation.en: or maybe owning a bunch of stuff.
translation.zh: 或者可能需要拥有很多物品

translation.en: Maybe that was happiness."
translation.zh: 可能这样我就会感到幸福”

translation.en: Whatever happiness was, I knew, once I got there, I'd finally feel free.
translation.zh: 无论幸福是什么 我知道一旦我拥有它 我就会终于感到自由

translation.en: I bought new cars, and electronics, and closets full of expensive clothes.
translation.zh: 我买了新车、电子产品和装满昂贵服装的衣柜

translation.en: I bought expensive home decorations and furniture,
translation.zh: 我买了昂贵的家庭装饰品和家具

translation.en: and I always had the latest gadgets.
translation.zh: 我总是紧跟时代潮流买一些新奇的东西

translation.en: And when there wasn't enough cash in the bank, I paid for expensive meals,
translation.zh: 当银行卡里没有足够的现金我会用信用卡来支付

translation.en: rounds of drinks, and frivolous vacations with credit cards.
translation.zh: 昂贵的餐费、无数的酒水还有无聊假期的花销

translation.en: As I made more money, I spent more money, all in the pursuit of happiness.
translation.zh: 我赚的越多 就花的越多所有的钱都用来追寻幸福

translation.en: All in the pursuit of the American dream.
translation.zh: 全部都用来追寻美国梦

translation.en: [man] One thing I think is unique is
translation.zh: 我认为有一件特别的事是

translation.en: when you're an immigrant, the American dream is still a good thing.
translation.zh: 即使你是移民美国梦依旧是个好东西

translation.en: I think it's only people who grew up in the American dream
translation.zh: 我认为只有在美国梦中长大的人

translation.en: that no longer value the American dream, because it's become the American nightmare.
translation.zh: 会不再认为美国梦有价值因为它显然成为了美国噩梦

translation.en: [Annie] People in the US work longer hours than almost any industrialized country,
translation.zh: 美国人的工作时间比几乎任何工业化国家都长

translation.en: depending on which data you look at, but we work enormously long hours.
translation.zh: 虽然这取决于你看的是什么数据但我们工作的时间确实非常长

translation.en: We work as long hours as people did during feudal society.
translation.zh: 我们和封建社会时期的人一样长时间工作

translation.en: We have such short vacations, if any.
translation.zh: 如果有假期 也都是很短的假期

translation.en: Half the country doesn't even take two weeks of vacation.
translation.zh: 一半的美国人 假期甚至都没有两周

translation.en: We're commuting longer hours than ever before,
translation.zh: 我们上下班的时间也比以往任何时候都长

translation.en: and then we're spending more time alone in front of screens than ever before.
translation.zh: 在屏幕前独处的时间也比以往任何时候都多

translation.en: We're losing the stuff that actually makes us happy
translation.zh: 我们正在失去那些真正让我们快乐的东西

translation.en: and makes society more safe and secure,
translation.zh: 让社会变得更安稳的东西

translation.en: which is community.
translation.zh: 那就是群体

translation.en: Um, we're losing that and changing that time to work and buy more stuff.
translation.zh: 我们逐步失去了社交 而把这些时间用来工作和购买更多的东西

translation.en: [Erwin] What you don't want in your life is this endless horizon of aspiration.
translation.zh: 在人生中 你不想要无尽的渴求

translation.en: "I just need a bit more of this or a little bit more of that.
translation.zh: “我只是需要再多一点的这个或那个

translation.en: I need more success, more income, more wealth,
translation.zh: 我需要更成功、更多的收入更多的财富

translation.en: a bigger house, bigger car, bigger this," because that's just an endless black hole.
translation.zh: 更大的房子、更大的汽车、更大的这个” 因为这就是个无底洞

translation.en: When we get all of the things that we want,
translation.zh: 当我们拥有我们想要的一切时

translation.en: we tend to be wrong in the predictions that we made about how happy we would be,
translation.zh: 我们会发现我们预测自己会有多幸福往往都是错误的

translation.en: because the brain normalizes those things.
translation.zh: 因为大脑使这些事物常规化了

translation.en: After a few months of that, you normalize it,
translation.zh: 这样过几个月 你就适应它了

translation.en: and you say, "All right, that was great at the time,
translation.zh: 你会说：“好吧 那时感觉还挺棒的

translation.en: but now I have a new set of desires, a new set of dreams,"
translation.zh: 但现在我有新的渴求和梦想了”

translation.en: and everything that is the ceiling today
translation.zh: 今天所有高高在上的东西

translation.en: becomes just the ground floor for a new level you're trying to get to.
translation.zh: 都变成你要实现的下一个目标的垫脚石

translation.en: And so, really what the American dream is is this sense of freedom.
translation.zh: 所以真正的美国梦就是这种自由的感觉

translation.en: Now how do you get that? Just by gathering up more money? Nope, won't do it.
translation.zh: 你会怎么得到呢？只是通过积累更多的钱？不 不会实现的

translation.en: Not if you gather up yet more stuff
translation.zh: 不是积累更多的钱然后去买更多的东西

translation.en: to go with your more money, because you're still gonna be teetering.
translation.zh: 因为这样你还是入不敷出

translation.en: You just added zeros to your stupidity is all you did then.
translation.zh: 你只是在愚蠢值上填了一位数罢了

translation.en: And so, what happens is you have to learn to contract your, in quotes, "needs,"
translation.zh: 因此你需要学会的是减少你加双引号的“需求”

translation.en: so that you can create a buffer around your life
translation.zh: 这样你就可以在生活里建立一个缓冲区

translation.en: and create this independence to where you've got enough savings
translation.zh: 拥有足够多储蓄 来创造这种独立性

translation.en: that you can say, "Take this job and shove it," if you need to.
translation.zh: 储蓄多到你可以在必要的时候说“我不需要这份工作 滚吧”

translation.en: You don't have a bunch of debt pounding down on your head,
translation.zh: 你没有一大堆债务砸在你头上

translation.en: buying things that you don't really need with money you don't really have
translation.zh: 用你并不真正拥有的钱去买你并不真正需要的东西

translation.en: to impress people you don't even really like.
translation.zh: 去讨好你并不真正喜欢的人

translation.en: And so, what you've done there is you gave up your independence,
translation.zh: 你这样做 就是放弃了你的独立性

translation.en: you gave up your freedom…
translation.zh: 放弃了你的自由…

translation.en: in return for some stuff that's gonna be worth nothing in next year's garage sale.
translation.zh: 换取一些在明年车库二手销售中根本不值钱的物品

translation.en: [Erwin] You almost have buyer's remorse, and you also have this gambler's dilemma
translation.zh: 你同时拥有了买家的后悔情绪和赌徒的困境

translation.en: where you gambled for this and now you have it.
translation.zh: 你赌的就是这个 现在你拥有了

translation.en: Do you want to give it up even though it makes you unhappy?
translation.zh: 即使它让你不开心 你会想放弃吗？

translation.en: So I think a part of the process for all of us
translation.zh: 所以我认为我们所有人需要做的一步

translation.en: is making sure we actually are going after what we truly want.
translation.zh: 就是要确保我们真正在追求自己真正想要的

translation.en: And when we have something, to do an honest evaluation of going,
translation.zh: 当我们要买什么的时候做一个诚实的评估

translation.en: "Is this something I want to define my life? Do I really want to keep this?"
translation.zh: “我想以此来定义我的生活吗？我真的会一直留用它吗？”

translation.en: [Ryan] Chasing the American dream, it cost me so much more than money.
translation.zh: 我追逐美国梦 花费的不仅仅是金钱

translation.en: My life was filled with stress, and anxiety, and discontent.
translation.zh: 我的生活充满了压力、焦虑和不满

translation.en: It got to a point in my life where I didn't know what was important.
translation.zh: 在我的人生中已经发展到了我不知道什么是重要的

translation.en: But one thing was clear.
translation.zh: 但有一件事我很清楚

translation.en: I had this gaping void in my life.
translation.zh: 我的生活中有这种巨大的空虚感

translation.en: So I tried to fill that void the same way many people do, with stuff.
translation.zh: 所以我试图像很多人一样用购物来填补这种空虚

translation.en: I continued to work 60, 70, sometimes 80 hours a week,
translation.zh: 我继续每周工作60、70甚至有时80个小时

translation.en: forsaking some of the most important aspects of my life.
translation.zh: 放弃了我生活中一些最重要的事情

translation.en: I barely thought about my health, or my relationships,
translation.zh: 我几乎没有考虑过我的健康还有人际关系

translation.en: or things that I was passionate about.
translation.zh: 或者是我热爱的东西

translation.en: I was living paycheck to paycheck. Living for a paycheck. Living for stuff.
translation.zh: 我过着月光族的生活 为薪水而生活为物质而生活

translation.en: [Joshua] It's like I was swerving from credit card purchases to reckless spending
translation.zh: 就好像我用信用卡使我的消费变得不计后果

translation.en: to accumulating debt to maintain a lifestyle I didn't even enjoy.
translation.zh: 积累债务来维持一种我甚至都不喜欢的生活方式

translation.en: I had all of the stuff to fill every corner of my consumer-driven life.
translation.zh: 我用各种各样的物品来填满我用消费驱动的生活的每个角落

translation.en: Giant televisions, fine china, stainless steel appliances,
translation.zh: 大显示屏的电视、精致的瓷器不锈钢器皿

translation.en: marble countertops, expensive watches, tailored suits
translation.zh: 大理石台面、昂贵的手表定制的西装

translation.en: and more, and more, and so much more.
translation.zh: 还有很多很多 不计其数

translation.en: Then, toward the end of 2008, actually it was two days before Christmas,
translation.zh: 在2008年年底其实是在圣诞节的两天前

translation.en: I got a phone call from Mom.
translation.zh: 我接到了妈妈的电话

translation.en: She had just moved down to Florida earlier that year
translation.zh: 那年早些时候她刚搬到南边的佛罗里达

translation.en: to finally retire on Social Security.
translation.zh: 退休后依靠社保生活

translation.en: But on December 23rd, she found out she had Stage IV lung cancer.
translation.zh: 但在12月23日她被查出患有肺癌晚期

translation.en: And in less than a year, she was gone.
translation.zh: 不到一年 她就去世了

translation.en: I spent a lot of time with Mom that year down in Florida
translation.zh: 那年我和妈妈在佛罗里达相处了很长一段时间

translation.en: as she struggled through her chemo and radiation.
translation.zh: 陪伴她在化疗和放疗中挣扎

translation.en: But when she passed, I realized I needed to make one last visit.
translation.zh: 但当她去世后我意识到我需要最后去她家里一趟

translation.en: And this time, it was to deal with her stuff.
translation.zh: 这一次 是收拾她的遗物

translation.en: So I flew from Dayton, Ohio, down to St. Pete Beach, Florida.
translation.zh: 所以我从俄亥俄州的代顿飞到佛罗里达州的圣彼得堡海滩

translation.en: When I arrived, do you know what I found?
translation.zh: 当我到了那里你知道我发现了什么吗？

translation.en: Stuff.
translation.zh: 物品

translation.en: Like three houses worth of stuff crammed into Mom's tiny one-bedroom apartment.
translation.zh: 能堆满三栋房子的东西塞进了妈妈的一居室小公寓里

translation.en: Now, it's not like Mom was a hoarder.
translation.zh: 看样子 我妈妈并不像是一个储物狂

translation.en: I mean, I didn't find any dead cats in her freezer.
translation.zh: 我在她的冰箱里也没有找到死猫

translation.en: But she owned a lot of stuff. Sixty-five years' worth of accumulations.
translation.zh: 但她拥有的那些东西都是65年慢慢积累来的

translation.en: Did you know the average American household
translation.zh: 你知道一般的美国家庭里

translation.en: has more than 300,000 items in it?
translation.zh: 放有超过30万件物品吗？

translation.en: Just take a look around at your average basement, or attic, or garage.
translation.zh: 环顾你自己的地下室、阁楼或车库就知道了

translation.en: What do you see?
translation.zh: 你看到了什么？

translation.en: Unused sporting goods, exercise equipment,
translation.zh: 未使用的运动用品、运动器材

translation.en: camping gear, holiday decorations,
translation.zh: 露营装备、节日装饰品

translation.en: musical instruments, spare parts,
translation.zh: 乐器、零配件

translation.en: outdated electronics, random cords and miscellaneous cables,
translation.zh: 过时的电子产品、杂乱的电线和各种各样的电缆

translation.en: magazines, and cassette tapes, and compact discs,
translation.zh: 杂志、盒式磁带和光盘

translation.en: tchotchkes, and knickknacks, and trinkets,
translation.zh: 小摆件、小衣饰和小配饰

translation.en: and all the things we forgot we even owned.
translation.zh: 还有那些我们甚至不记得拥有过的东西

translation.en: Boxes, and bins, and entire rooms stuffed with stuff.
translation.zh: 盒子、箱子还有整个房间都塞满了东西

translation.en: We had so much. So much stuff.
translation.zh: 我们有太多、太多东西了

translation.en: My closet was out of control.
translation.zh: 我的衣柜失控了

translation.en: So I had a closet full of clothes. I had a dresser full of clothes.
translation.zh: 我有一个装满衣服的衣柜还有一个装满了衣服衣橱

translation.en: Photography equipment, bicycle equipment.
translation.zh: 摄影器材、自行车器材

translation.en: Skin care products, beauty products.
translation.zh: 皮肤护理产品、美容产品

translation.en: Shoes, purses.
translation.zh: 鞋、钱包

translation.en: I'd open the closet, stuff would fall out.
translation.zh: 我打开壁橱 里面的东西就会掉出来

translation.en: I don't know why, but I had three soccer cleats,
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么但我有三双足球钉鞋

translation.en: even though I don't really even play soccer. [laughs]
translation.zh: 虽然我根本不踢足球

translation.en: You know, things people had given me throughout the years,
translation.zh: 你知道 这些年来人们给我的东西

translation.en: whether those be cards, or objects,
translation.zh: 不管是卡片还是物品

translation.en: or tokens that I'd kept from different events we'd gone to.
translation.zh: 或是我们参加过的不同活动留下的纪念品

translation.en: But it was just a never-ending, uh, you know, turnstile of, uh, "I need this. I need that."
translation.zh: 但这永无休止 就像旋转门一样“我需要这个 我需要那个”

translation.en: [woman] It's so easy to buy things that we think are the solution to our problems.
translation.zh: 买我们认为可以解决问题的东西是很容易的

translation.en: I remember when I had babies, and I really wanted them to sleep well,
translation.zh: 我记得我生小孩之后我非常希望他们能好好睡觉

translation.en: and I thought I just needed the perfect sleep device in order to make that happen.
translation.zh: 我觉得我需要一个完美的睡眠设备来实现这一点

translation.en: So I had probably four different types of swaddles,
translation.zh: 我大概有四种不同类型的襁褓

translation.en: multiple different types of zip-up sleep devices.
translation.zh: 多种不同类型的拉链式睡眠设备

translation.en: There are… If you go on Amazon, you can find there are dozens and dozens
translation.zh: 如果你浏览亚马逊你会发现有很多很多

translation.en: of different types of mechanisms to get babies to sleep.
translation.zh: 不同类型的设备让婴儿入睡

translation.en: Pieces of equipment that you can buy.
translation.zh: 有大量的设备可供你购买

translation.en: But the reality is that getting babies to sleep is just really hard,
translation.zh: 但事实却是 让婴儿入睡真的极其困难

translation.en: and we can fall into this trap of trying to buy our way out of the hard times.
translation.zh: 我们可能会陷入这样的陷阱试图通过购买设备来摆脱入睡困境

translation.en: And it's… it's often not very successful and very expensive.
translation.zh: 但通常来讲 这些东西又贵又不实用

translation.en: [T.K.] I actually think the best way to know if you have too many things
translation.zh: 我认为知道你是否拥有过多的东西最好的方法

translation.en: isn't by waiting to see if you run out of room to keep them,
translation.zh: 不是等着看你是否会没地方来放它们

translation.en: but asking yourself if you've run out of purposeful things to do with them.
translation.zh: 而是问问自己是否这些东西在你这里已经毫无用处

translation.en: When you've run out of purposeful things to do with things,
translation.zh: 当你发现这个东西没有可用的地方

translation.en: even if you only have one thing, you already have too many things.
translation.zh: 即使你只有这一件东西你也算是拥有过多的东西了 对吧

translation.en: The reason we are so depressed and so empty when we have so much
translation.zh: 当我们拥有那么多东西的时候却依旧如此沮丧和空虚的原因

translation.en: is that if you get more of the wrong thing, it becomes less.
translation.zh: 就是无用的东西越少沮丧和空虚就会越少

translation.en: There are deeper things that… that fulfill us.
translation.zh: 有更深层的东西可以满足我们

translation.en: Our need for meaning, our need for progress, our need for intimacy.
translation.zh: 我们对深层内涵的需要对进步的需要  对亲密关系的需要

translation.en: The reason the message of minimalism is so powerful
translation.zh: 极简主义所传达的信息如此强大的原因

translation.en: is because we're bingeing on all the wrong things,
translation.zh: 是因为我们在各种错误的东西上肆意消费

translation.en: and we're dying of hunger for the things that really matter.
translation.zh: 而在那些真正重要的东西上无限匮乏

translation.en: But, of course, most of us aren't hoarders, right?
translation.zh: 当然 我们大多数人都不是储物狂对吧

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是的

translation.en: We just hold on to a lot of stuff.
translation.zh: 我们只是保留了很多东西

translation.en: We hold on to a lifetime of collected memories.
translation.zh: 我们保存着这一生所收集的记忆

translation.en: I know Mom certainly did, and I had no idea what to do with any of it.
translation.zh: 我知道妈妈肯定是这样的但我不知道这些东西该怎么处理

translation.en: So I did what any good son would do.
translation.zh: 所以我做了任何一个孝子都会做的事

translation.en: I called U-Haul.
translation.zh: 我叫了友好拖车

translation.en: I called U-Haul, and I asked for the largest truck they had.
translation.zh: 我打电话给友好拖车问他们要一辆最大的卡车

translation.en: In fact, I needed one so large I had to wait an extra day
translation.zh: 事实上 我需要的车太大了我必须多等一天

translation.en: until the 26-foot truck was available.
translation.zh: 等到8米的卡车有档期

translation.en: As I waited for that U-Haul to arrive, I invited some of Mom's friends over
translation.zh: 我在等待拖车来的时段里我邀请一些妈妈的朋友来家里

translation.en: to help me sort through her stuff.
translation.zh: 帮我整理她的东西

translation.en: I mean, there was just too much stuff to go at it alone.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 如果只我有一个人有太多的东西需要整理了

translation.en: Her living room was stuffed with big antique furniture, and old paintings,
translation.zh: 她的起居室里摆满了古董家具和旧画

translation.en: and more doilies than I could count.
translation.zh: 还有我数不过来的桌布

translation.en: And her kitchen was stuffed with hundreds of plates, and cups, and bowls,
translation.zh: 她的厨房里堆放了几百个盘子、杯子和碗

translation.en: and ill-assorted utensils.
translation.zh: 还有一些零散的餐具

translation.en: And her bathroom was stuffed
translation.zh: 她的浴室里都是化妆品

translation.en: with enough makeup, and face creams, and hygiene products
translation.zh: 她的浴室里都是化妆品 面霜、卫生产品足够成为一家小型的美容供给商

translation.en: to start a small beauty supply business.
translation.zh: 面霜、卫生产品足够成为一家小型的美容供给商

translation.en: And it looked like someone was running a hotel out of her linen closet,
translation.zh: 她衣柜里的亚麻制品多到看起来像是在运营一家酒店

translation.en: which was stuffed with mismatched bath towels, beach towels, and dish towels.
translation.zh: 包括各种不配套的浴巾、沙滩巾和洗碗巾

translation.en: Don't even get me started on Mom's bedroom.
translation.zh: 更别提我妈的卧室了

translation.en: I mean, why did Mom have 14 winter coats stuffed into her bedroom closet?
translation.zh: 我是说 为什么卧室的衣橱里塞了14件冬天的衣服？

translation.en: Come on. She lived in St. Pete Beach.
translation.zh: 拜托 她可是住在圣彼得海滩

translation.en: So anyway, there I was attempting to finish packing all of Mom's stuff
translation.zh: 不管怎么说当我正试图把妈妈的东西打包好时

translation.en: when I looked under her bed.
translation.zh: 我看向了她的床底下

translation.en: I noticed these four boxes, these old printer paper boxes.
translation.zh: 我注意到这四个旧的打印机纸盒子

translation.en: Kind of heavy, sealed with excessive amounts of packing tape.
translation.zh: 有点重 用很多的包装胶带密封着

translation.en: I noticed each box was labeled
translation.zh: 我注意到每个箱子都有标签

translation.en: with just a number written on the side in thick black marker.
translation.zh: 在箱子边上用黑色粗体的马克笔标了数字

translation.en: And I stood there…
translation.zh: 我站在那里…

translation.en: looking down…
translation.zh: 往下看…

translation.en: wondering what could possibly be inside those boxes.
translation.zh: 好奇到底是什么装在这些盒子里

translation.en: Turns out it was my old elementary school paperwork.
translation.zh: 打开来发现里面装的都是我小学时的文稿

translation.en: Grades one through four.
translation.zh: 一至四年级都有

translation.en: As I opened those boxes, my curiosity ran wild,
translation.zh: 当我打开那些盒子时我的好奇心越来越大

translation.en: and I thought to myself, "Why was Mom holding on to all that stupid paperwork?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“为什么妈妈要留着这些愚蠢的文稿？”

translation.en: But then all these memories came rushing back, and it was obvious.
translation.zh: 但随后所有的记忆都涌了上来答案也显而易见

translation.en: Mom had been holding on to a piece of me.
translation.zh: 妈妈一直在保留着我的一部分

translation.en: Mom was holding on to all the memories inside those boxes. Right?
translation.zh: 妈妈将这些记忆都保留在这些盒子里了 对吗？

translation.en: But wait a minute.
translation.zh: 但是稍等一下

translation.en: Those boxes had been sealed for more than two decades.
translation.zh: 这些盒子密封了超过二十年

translation.en: It was clear Mom hadn't been accessing any of the memories inside those boxes,
translation.zh: 很显然 妈妈并没有翻看过 这些盒子里任何的记忆

translation.en: which helped me understand something important for the first time.
translation.zh: 这让我第一次明白了一些重要的事情

translation.en: Our memories are not in our things.
translation.zh: 我们的回忆不在于我们的物品

translation.en: Our memories are inside us.
translation.zh: 我们的回忆存在我们的脑中

translation.en: You see, Mom didn't need to hold on to those boxes to hold on to a piece of me.
translation.zh: 其实妈妈不需要保留那些盒子来留住我的一部分

translation.en: I was never inside those boxes.
translation.zh: 我从不存在于那些盒子里

translation.en: But then I looked around her apartment, I looked around at all her stuff,
translation.zh: 但之后我环顾了她的公寓又看了看她所有的物品

translation.en: and I realized I was getting ready to do the same thing.
translation.zh: 我意识到我准备好做同样的事情了

translation.en: If I'm being honest with myself,
translation.zh: 如果我要对自己诚实

translation.en: I was just gonna selfishly cling to most of Mom's stuff.
translation.zh: 我会自私地留住妈妈大部分物品

translation.en: But, of course, I wasn't gonna get any real value from it
translation.zh: 但是很显然 我不会从这些物品中获得任何真正价值

translation.en: as it sat there locked away in perpetuity.
translation.zh: 它们只会被永远封存在那里

translation.en: But the truth is that, by letting go,
translation.zh: 但事实上 对这些物品放手

translation.en: I realized I could add value to other people's lives.
translation.zh: 我认为可以为别人的生活增添一些价值

translation.en: So I donated most of her stuff to her friends and to local charities,
translation.zh: 因此我把妈妈大部分遗物捐给了她的朋友和当地的慈善机构

translation.en: finding the stuff a new home.
translation.zh: 给这些物品一个新的去处

translation.en: And the few items I was able to sell,
translation.zh: 还有几件我可以卖的物品

translation.en: I was able to take that money and donate it to the two charities
translation.zh: 我将拿着这笔钱 捐给两家慈善机构

translation.en: that helped Mom through her chemo and radiation.
translation.zh: 这两家慈善机构曾帮助妈妈进行化疗和放疗

translation.en: You see, I realized I could contribute beyond myself
translation.zh: 你看 我意识到如果我愿意放手

translation.en: if I was willing to let go.
translation.zh: 我可以创造超过本身的价值

translation.en: When I finally returned to Ohio,
translation.zh: 当我最后回到俄亥俄州时

translation.en: I returned with just a handful of sentimental items.
translation.zh: 我只带了些可以手拿的以供怀念的物品

translation.en: An old painting, a few photographs,
translation.zh: 一幅旧画、几张照片

translation.en: maybe even a doily or two,
translation.zh: 还有一两个桌巾

translation.en: which helped me understand that by having fewer sentimental items,
translation.zh: 这让我明白少买一些感情用事的东西

translation.en: we're able to enjoy those sentimental items much more.
translation.zh: 会使我们更喜欢那些东西

translation.en: I get far more value from the few items I kept
translation.zh: 我从仅留的这些物品里得到了更大的价值

translation.en: than if I were to water them down with dozens or even hundreds of trinkets.
translation.zh: 而不是用几十个甚至上百个小饰品来冲淡这种价值

translation.en: Ultimately, I had to let go of what was weighing me down before I could move on.
translation.zh: 在我能继续前行之前我必须先放下那些压在我身上的东西

translation.en: To move on…
translation.zh: 继续前行…

translation.en: I had to take an inventory of my own life.
translation.zh: 我要为自己的生活整理一个物品清单

translation.en: Turns out I had an organized life.
translation.zh: 结果证明我的生活还算井井有条

translation.en: But really, I was just a well-organized hoarder.
translation.zh: 但其实 我只是个有条理的储物狂

translation.en: And if you would've looked beneath the surface,
translation.zh: 如果你看看表面之下的东西

translation.en: you would have found a lifetime of unchecked consumption.
translation.zh: 你会发现一个不计消费的生活

translation.en: As companies continue to innovate,
translation.zh: 随着公司不断创新

translation.en: our ability to show restraint is getting more and more difficult.
translation.zh: 我们表现出克制的能力也越来越难了

translation.en: Outsourced labor
translation.zh: 外包劳动力

translation.en: combined with advancements in shipping, manufacturing, and logistics
translation.zh: 结合航运、制造业和物流的进步

translation.en: has dropped the cost of consumer products to an all-time low.
translation.zh: 消费产品的成本降到了历史最低点

translation.en: And now, with one-click purchasing, same-day delivery,
translation.zh: 现如今的一键购买、当日送达

translation.en: and a society that has normalized credit card debt,
translation.zh: 还有一个信用卡债务正常化的社会

translation.en: we've dug ourselves into a hole.
translation.zh: 我们给自己挖了个坑

translation.en: The average American carries four credit cards in their wallet
translation.zh: 平均每个美国人的钱包里有四张信用卡

translation.en: and the average credit card debt for indebted households is more than $16,000.
translation.zh: 负债家庭的平均信用卡债务超过1.6万美元

translation.en: Each year, we spend more on shoes, jewelry, and watches than on higher education.
translation.zh: 每年 我们在鞋子、珠宝和手表上的消费远高于在高等教育上的消费

translation.en: [Denaye] I remember when I was a kid, there was something called layaway.
translation.zh: 我记得我小时候有一种叫做分期预付的东西

translation.en: We'd go to the department store and pick out our school clothes,
translation.zh: 我们会去百货公司挑选我们的校服

translation.en: and my mom would put it on layaway,
translation.zh: 妈妈用分期预付的方式结算

translation.en: which meant she would go and make payments once a week for several weeks
translation.zh: 这意味着她要连续几周每周还一次钱

translation.en: until she paid all of it off when she had all the money paid in.
translation.zh: 直到她逐渐赚钱 付清所有的钱

translation.en: That's when we got to bring home the stuff.
translation.zh: 那就是我们可以把东西带回家的时候

translation.en: This concept does not exist now. If you want the stuff,
translation.zh: 现在不存在这种形式了 如果你想要 用信用卡结算你立刻就可以拿走物品

translation.en: you put the credit card down and take it right away.
translation.zh: 如果你想要 用信用卡结算你立刻就可以拿走物品

translation.en: And I think that functional change in the way that we buy
translation.zh: 我认为这功能性地改变了我们购买的方式

translation.en: has made a difference in what our expectations are
translation.zh: 改变了我们的期望

translation.en: and a sort of sense of entitlement about what we should have,
translation.zh: 以及我们应该拥有什么、何时拥有

translation.en: and when we should have it, and if we should have to wait for it.
translation.zh: 以及如果我们需要为它而等待的所属感

translation.en: [Dave] America, sadly, has gotten increasingly emotionally immature.
translation.zh: 可悲的是美国人在情感上越来越不成熟

translation.en: "I want it, and I want it now, and I deserve it because I breathe air."
translation.zh: “我想要这个 我现在就要我值得拥有这个 因为我活着”

translation.en: This is a four-year-old child in the cereal aisle
translation.zh: 这就像一个四岁的孩子在麦片货架前

translation.en: throwing a fit because they can't have Froot Loops.
translation.zh: 因为他们不能吃果脆圈而大发脾气

translation.en: And yet it's a 54-year-old woman I'm talking to or man I'm talking to,
translation.zh: 但现在 这是一个54岁的男人或女人对我说的话

translation.en: 'cause he can't buy this little item he wants,
translation.zh: 因为他不能买这个他想要的小东西

translation.en: 'cause he doesn't have the money.
translation.zh: 因为他没有那么多钱

translation.en: Guess what? You're never gonna have the money for everything you want.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？你永远不会有钱买下所有你想要的东西

translation.en: [T.K.] The kind of debt that creates the most problems in our society
translation.zh: 在我们的社会中产生问题最多的债务

translation.en: comes from a felt need to keep up with appearances.
translation.zh: 来源于追求表面成功的强烈需求

translation.en: Placing unnecessary burdens on yourself in order to maintain some kind of image.
translation.zh: 为了保持某种形象给自己增加不必要的负担

translation.en: If I can't afford a BMW,
translation.zh: 如果我买不起宝马

translation.en: but I go into debt in order to acquire one,
translation.zh: 我为了买宝马而选择负债

translation.en: I'm doing that because I-I want the… the social rewards, right,
translation.zh: 我这样做是想得到一种社会奖励 对吧？

translation.en: of… of being seen as a certain kind of person.
translation.zh: 被看作某类人的社会奖励

translation.en: Once your basic needs are met, the way that we as humans determine what is enough
translation.zh: 一旦你的基本需求得到满足我们人类决定什么是足够的方式

translation.en: is relative to the people around us.
translation.zh: 与他们周围的人息息相关

translation.en: Um, and so, that's where the saying "keeping up with the Joneses" came up.
translation.zh: 这就是“向邻居看齐”这句话的来历

translation.en: We judge our furniture, our clothes, our car based on the people around us.
translation.zh: 我们根据周围的人来评价自己的家具、衣服、汽车

translation.en: It used to be that the people around us were of similar socioeconomic background.
translation.zh: 过去 我们周围的人都有相似的社会经济背景

translation.en: So we were like, "It's cool. We all got the same stuff."
translation.zh: 所以我们可能会说：“挺好的我们都用差不多的东西”

translation.en: But now, with the onslaught of television and social media,
translation.zh: 但现在 随着电视和社交媒体的冲击

translation.en: they have what's called the vertical expansion of our reference group.
translation.zh: 发生了一种所谓的参照群体的竖直扩展

translation.en: Now I'm comparing my hair to Jennifer Aniston's.
translation.zh: 现在我都敢把我的头发和詹妮弗·安妮斯顿做比较

translation.en: Now I'm comparing my house to Kim Kardashian's.
translation.zh: 现在我把我的房子和金·卡戴珊做比较

translation.en: I think that we are more stressed and discontented today than ever before,
translation.zh: 我认为我们现在比以往任何时候都更有压力 更加不满足

translation.en: because we know so much more, or we think we know so much more,
translation.zh: 因为我们知道得太多或者我们认为自己知道得太多

translation.en: about what's going on inside of the house of our neighbors and our friends.
translation.zh: 知道我们的邻居和朋友的房子里发生着什么

translation.en: And the comparison is so much stronger than in generations past,
translation.zh: 这种对比 要比过去几代人强烈得多

translation.en: and we're constantly comparing our lives to other people's lives.
translation.zh: 而我们总是不断拿自己的生活和别人的生活做比较

translation.en: And when we do that, it rarely measures up.
translation.zh: 当我们这样做的时候我们总是不满足

translation.en: This generation, more than previous generations,
translation.zh: 这一代比前几代人

translation.en: we have to learn how to manage our attention,
translation.zh: 更要学会如何管理我们的注意力

translation.en: because there are so many people competing for it
translation.zh: 因为有很多人都在竞争我们的注意力

translation.en: and telling us, like, "Look at this, and you'll be happy!"
translation.zh: 告诉我们：“看看这个你会变得幸福的！”

translation.en: "Buy this, and you'll be happy!"
translation.zh: “买这个吧 你会变得幸福的！”

translation.en: And you have to step back from all of that and say, "No, no, no. I first need time
translation.zh: 你必须从这一切中退一步说“不 首先我需要时间

translation.en: to come up with my own ideas about what's gonna make me happy."
translation.zh: 去想一想 什么能让我感到幸福”

translation.en: For me, it all started with that one question.
translation.zh: 对我来说 一切都始于那一个问题

translation.en: How might your life be better with less?
translation.zh: 从简 你的生活能怎样变得更好？

translation.en: By answering that question, I was able to identify the purpose of minimalism.
translation.zh: 通过回答这个问题我能够确定极简主义的目的

translation.en: Not just the "how to," but the more important "why to."
translation.zh: 不只是“如何做”而更重要的是“为什么做”

translation.en: I realized, if I simplified my life,
translation.zh: 我意识到 如果我简化我的生活

translation.en: I'd have more time for my health, my relationships,
translation.zh: 我就会有更多的时间来照顾我的健康我的人际关系

translation.en: my creativity, my finances,
translation.zh: 我的创造力、我的经济

translation.en: and I could contribute beyond myself in a meaningful way.
translation.zh: 我可以用一种有意义的方式做出超越自我的贡献

translation.en: You see, I was able to understand the benefits of minimalism
translation.zh: 你看 早在我清理步入式衣橱之前

translation.en: well before I ever cleaned out a walk-in closet.
translation.zh: 我就能够理解极简主义的好处

translation.en: And so, when it came time for me to actually declutter, I started small.
translation.zh: 所以当我开始整理的时候我从小件开始

translation.en: I asked myself another question.
translation.zh: 我又问了自己另一个问题

translation.en: What if you removed one material possession from your life
translation.zh: 如果一个月每天都从你的生活中拿走一件物质财产

translation.en: each day for a month? Just one. What would happen?
translation.zh: 那会怎么样？ 就一件 会发生什么？

translation.en: Let me tell you. I got rid of way more than 30 items in the first 30 days.
translation.zh: 让我告诉你 在最初的30天里我就处理掉了30多件东西

translation.en: Like way, way more.
translation.zh: 就像这样 这样 这样清理掉很多

translation.en: It became this kind of personal challenge, discovering what I could get rid of.
translation.zh: 这变成了一种个人挑战发现我还可以摆脱什么

translation.en: So I searched my rooms and closets, my cabinets and hallways,
translation.zh: 所以我找遍了我的房间、壁橱、橱柜和走廊

translation.en: my car and office, rummaging for items to part with,
translation.zh: 车上、办公室翻箱倒柜寻找要丢弃的物品

translation.en: retaining only the things that added value to my life.
translation.zh: 只保留那些对我的生活有价值的东西

translation.en: Pondering each artifact in my home, I'd ask,
translation.zh: 在思考我家里的每一件物品时我会问

translation.en: "Does this thing add value to my life?"
translation.zh: “这东西能给我的生活增加价值吗？”

translation.en: The more I asked this question, the more I gained momentum
translation.zh: 我问得越多 就越有动力

translation.en: and embracing minimalism got easier by the day.
translation.zh: 遵行极简主义一天天变得简单

translation.en: The more you do it, the freer, and happier, and lighter you feel,
translation.zh: 你舍弃得越多 你感觉越自由、越快乐、越轻松就越想摆脱掉更多东西

translation.en: and the more you wanna throw overboard.
translation.zh: 你感觉越自由、越快乐、越轻松就越想摆脱掉更多东西

translation.en: For me, a few shirts led to half a closet.
translation.zh: 对我来说 清理掉几件衬衫就空出了半个衣橱

translation.en: A few DVDs led to deep-sixing an entire library of unused discs.
translation.zh: 清理掉几张光盘就清理掉了整个未使用的光盘库

translation.en: A few decorative items led to junk drawers who shed their adjective.
translation.zh: 清理掉几件装饰物品就让储物抽屉中不再堆满垃圾

translation.en: It's a beautiful cycle. The more action you take, the more you wanna take action.
translation.zh: 这是一个良性循环你采取的行动越多 就越想采取行动

translation.en: Once I started to get rid of stuff, it was just like the momentum just took over.
translation.zh: 一旦我开始处理掉了一些东西就会有一种冲动主导了我的注意力

translation.en: It was a snowball that I could not stop.
translation.zh: 就像滚雪球一样 根本停不下来

translation.en: I was ready to throw out as many things as possible.
translation.zh: 我准备好了扔掉尽可能多的东西

translation.en: [Rechna] When you open up those drawers and look at what's in the back of them,
translation.zh: 兄弟 当你打开抽屉 看看里面是什么

translation.en: I don't think I even realized
translation.zh: 我认为自己根本不知道

translation.en: half the stuff that we had hidden away in closets and in drawers.
translation.zh: 我们藏在壁橱和抽屉里一半的东西

translation.en: [Victor] It… It really helped by focusing on just one part of the house,
translation.zh: 只关注房子的一部分 而不只是考虑

translation.en: instead of just thinking,
translation.zh: 确实很有帮助

translation.en: "Oh, wow, I have 35 years of things in my house that I need to get rid of."
translation.zh: “我的房子里有积累35年的东西需要处理掉”

translation.en: [Michael] We got rid of our storage rental.
translation.zh: 我们还省掉了仓库的租金

translation.en: A huge storage rental that we'd been paying for for years
translation.zh: 我们多年来一直在支付的一笔巨额仓库租金

translation.en: and didn't really even know what was in there, gone.
translation.zh: 甚至都不知道里面有什么现在都没了

translation.en: I remember going through my CD collection,
translation.zh: 我记得我把光盘收藏品翻了一遍

translation.en: and I couldn't even remember if I had a CD player in my car.
translation.zh: 我甚至不记得我的车里有没有光盘播放器

translation.en: That was the one thing that made me think, "That's probably a reason
translation.zh: 就是这件事让我思考“对于我来说 如果不知道

translation.en: for me not to hold on to these CDs anymore if I don't even know if I can play them."
translation.zh: 是否能播放这些光盘那就是该扔掉他们的理由”

translation.en: As I began to get rid of things, one at a time, I just felt so much freer.
translation.zh: 当我开始处理那些物品一次处理一件 我就觉得自由多了

translation.en: There was freedom.
translation.zh: 我感受到了自由

translation.en: When I started going through it, I got rid of 14 pairs of pants.
translation.zh: 当我开始处理的时候我处理掉了14条裤子

translation.en: I couldn't believe how high the stack was.
translation.zh: 我简直不敢相信眼前那堆东西

translation.en: And so, I actually, you know, went through and counted them,
translation.zh: 因此我仔细数了一下

translation.en: and I'm like, "14 pairs of pants sitting in the closet!"
translation.zh: 我说：“衣柜里居然有14条裤子”

translation.en: [Michael] We put our house up for sale, because we just wanted to really start fresh
translation.zh: 我们把房子卖了因为我们只想重新开始

translation.en: and just grab life, you know, and… and really be free.
translation.zh: 只是想抓紧有限的生命做到真正的自由

translation.en: It was a very freeing feeling, um, to just get started, and so I… I ran with it.
translation.zh: 刚开始时 这是一种非常自由的感觉因此我就持续下去了

translation.en: [Joshua] Over the course of eight months after my mother died,
translation.zh: 在我母亲去世后的八个月里

translation.en: I deliberately jettisoned more than 90% of my material possessions.
translation.zh: 我故意抛弃了90%以上的物质财产

translation.en: Although, if you visited my home today, you probably wouldn't walk in and say,
translation.zh: 不过 如果你今天来我家作客你可能不会走进来说

translation.en: "Oh, my God!
translation.zh: “天啊！

translation.en: This guy's a minimalist!"
translation.zh: 这人肯定是极简主义者！”

translation.en: No, you'd probably just ask how we keep things so organized,
translation.zh: 不会的 你可能只会问我们是如何把物品放得这么有条理

translation.en: and I'd just tell you that my family and I, we don't own much,
translation.zh: 我会告诉你我的家庭和我没有很多的东西

translation.en: but everything we do own adds real value to our lives.
translation.zh: 但只要我们拥有的 就是可以为我们的生活增添价值的物品

translation.en: Each of our belongings, our clothes, our car, our kitchenware, our furniture
translation.zh: 我们的每一件物品：衣服、汽车厨具、家具

translation.en: has a function.
translation.zh: 都物尽其用

translation.en: As a minimalist, every possession serves a purpose
translation.zh: 作为一个极简主义者每一件物品都是有作用的

translation.en: or it brings me joy, and everything else is out of the way.
translation.zh: 或者它可以给我带来快乐剩下的其他物品就都扔掉了

translation.en: With all that clutter cleared, I…
translation.zh: 清理完所有的杂物后

translation.en: I finally felt compelled to start asking deeper questions.
translation.zh: 我终于感觉到有必要开始问一些更深层次的问题了

translation.en: Questions like, "When did I give so much meaning to all these material possessions?
translation.zh: 比如“我什么时候赋予了这些物质财富如此多的意义？

translation.en: What is truly important in my life?
translation.zh: 我生命中真正重要的是什么？

translation.en: Why have I been so discontented?
translation.zh: 我为什么有这么多的不满？

translation.en: Who is the person I want to become, and how will I define my own success?"
translation.zh: 我想成为什么样的人？我该如何定义自己的成功？”

translation.en: Now, these… these are tough questions with difficult answers,
translation.zh: 这些都是很难回答的问题

translation.en: but they've proven to be more important than just trashing my excess stuff.
translation.zh: 但它们比扔掉我多余的东西重要得多

translation.en: And if we don't answer these questions carefully, rigorously…
translation.zh: 如果我们不认真严格地回答这些问题…

translation.en: then those closets that we just decluttered
translation.zh: 那我们刚刚整理过的衣柜

translation.en: will be brimming with new purchases in the not-too-distant future.
translation.zh: 在不久的将来就会有新的购入

translation.en: So, as I let go…
translation.zh: 所以当我丢弃时…

translation.en: and as I started facing some of life's tougher questions…
translation.zh: 当我开始面对生活中一些更棘手的问题时…

translation.en: my life got simpler.
translation.zh: 我的生活变得简约了

translation.en: The people around me noticed something was different too.
translation.zh: 我周围的人也注意到了变化

translation.en: My best friend, a guy named Ryan Nicodemus,
translation.zh: 我最好的朋友是一个叫瑞恩·尼克蒂姆斯的男性

translation.en: whom I've known since we were fat little fifth-graders…
translation.zh: 在我五年级微胖的时候就认识他了…

translation.en: -he came to me one day and said… -[thunder rumbles]
translation.zh: 有一天他来找我说

translation.en: [Joshua] "Why the hell are you so happy?"
translation.zh: “你为什么天天这么开心？”

translation.en: So I told him about this thing called minimalism.
translation.zh: 于是我告诉他极简主义的这个概念

translation.en: And he said, "What the hell is minimalism?"
translation.zh: 他说：“极简主义是什么鬼？”

translation.en: And so I said, "Minimalism is the thing that gets us past the things,
translation.zh: 我说：“极简主义是让我们丢弃物品

translation.en: so we can make room for life's most important things,
translation.zh: 为生命中最重要的东西腾出空间

translation.en: which actually aren't things at all.
translation.zh: 而那些该丢弃的物品其实并不重要

translation.en: You know what, Ryan?
translation.zh: 知道吗 瑞恩？

translation.en: I think you might benefit from this minimalism thing too, because…
translation.zh: 我想你也会从极简主义中受益 因为…

translation.en: Well, because you've got a lot of shit."
translation.zh: 因为你有太多杂物了”

translation.en: [Ryan] That's when I remember really…
translation.zh: 我记得那时才真正地…

translation.en: really looking at what you were doing different with your life.
translation.zh: 真正地审视您在生活中有什么样的变化

translation.en: Like, I had to find out, like, "Okay, what is Josh doing differently?"
translation.zh: 我一定要知道“好 乔休现在的做法有何不同？”

translation.en: Because my life was so out of control. I needed to make a change.
translation.zh: 因为我的生活失去了控制我需要做出改变

translation.en: You obviously had made some changes, so that's…
translation.zh: 显然 你做出了一些改变 就是…

translation.en: I remember that's when I invited you for that really fancy lunch at Subway.
translation.zh: 我记得那时我邀请你去赛百味吃了一顿丰盛的午餐

translation.en: -Yeah. [chuckles] -And, uh, we sat down and…
translation.zh: -是的-我们坐下来…

translation.en: had… had our sandwiches,
translation.zh: 吃三明治

translation.en: and I just remember asking you, like, "Why the hell are you so happy?"
translation.zh: 我记得我问你“你为什么天天这么开心？”

translation.en: And, you know, if it wasn't you -who told me about minimalism… -[Joshua] Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 你知道吗如果不是你告诉我极简主义

translation.en: [Ryan] If it was anyone else, I don't know if I would have been so quick
translation.zh: 如果是其他人 我不知道我是否愿意这么快就去尝试

translation.en: to be willing to try it out.
translation.zh: 我不知道我是否愿意这么快就去尝试

translation.en: As we were sitting there, having our lunch,
translation.zh: 我们坐在那里吃午饭时

translation.en: he talked about how he'd spent the last several months simplifying.
translation.zh: 他谈到了过去几个月他是如何简化生活的

translation.en: Clearing the clutter. Making room for life's most important things.
translation.zh: 清理杂物为生活中最重要的事情腾出空间

translation.en: So me, being the problem solver that I am,
translation.zh: 因此 我作为一个问题解决者

translation.en: I decided to become a minimalist right there on the spot.
translation.zh: 我当场就决定成为一个极简主义者

translation.en: I looked up at Josh, and I excitedly announced,
translation.zh: 我看向乔休 激动地说

translation.en: "All right, man, I'm in. I'll do it! I'm going to become a minimalist.
translation.zh: “好吧兄弟 我也要加入 我也要这样做！我要成为一个极简主义者

translation.en: Now what?"
translation.zh: 现在该怎么做？”

translation.en: You see, I didn't want to spend several months slowly paring down, like he had.
translation.zh: 你知道 我不想像他那样花几个月的时间慢慢减负

translation.en: I mean, that was great for him, but I wanted faster results.
translation.zh: 我的意思是 那样对他来说很好但我想要更快的结果

translation.en: So, we came up with a wild idea called a packing party.
translation.zh: 所以我们想出了一个大胆的想法叫做打包派对

translation.en: We decided to pack all my belongings as if I were moving.
translation.zh: 我们决定像要搬家一样打包我所有的东西

translation.en: Then I would unpack only the items I needed over the next three weeks.
translation.zh: 然后在接下来三个星期把需要的东西拆出来用

translation.en: So Josh came over, and he literally helped me box up everything.
translation.zh: 乔休过来帮我把所有东西装箱

translation.en: My clothes, my kitchenware, my towels, my TVs,
translation.zh: 我的衣服、厨房用具、毛巾、电视

translation.en: my electronics, my framed photographs and paintings, my toiletries.
translation.zh: 我的电子产品、相框照片、画还有洗漱用品

translation.en: Everything. We literally pretended like I was moving.
translation.zh: 所有的东西 我们假装我就要搬家了

translation.en: So after nine hours and a couple of pizza deliveries,
translation.zh: 在九小时后 送了几次披萨外卖

translation.en: there Josh and I were, sitting in my second living room,
translation.zh: 乔休和我坐在我第二间客厅里

translation.en: staring at these boxes stacked halfway to my 12 ft. ceiling.
translation.zh: 盯着这些堆了我四米高天花板一半的的箱子

translation.en: Everything I owned, everything I had worked so hard for over the last decade,
translation.zh: 我所拥有的一切我在过去十年里努力工作得到的一切

translation.en: it was all sitting there in that room.
translation.zh: 都在那个房间里

translation.en: Just boxes stacked on top of boxes stacked on top of boxes.
translation.zh: 只是一层又一层盒子的堆积

translation.en: Now each box was labeled really well
translation.zh: 现在每个盒子都清楚地贴上了标签

translation.en: so I'd know where to go when I needed a particular item.
translation.zh: 这样当我需要某件物品时我就知道该去哪里找

translation.en: Labels like "junk drawer," "living room number one,"
translation.zh: 标签上标注“垃圾抽屉”“客厅一号”

translation.en: "kitchen utensils," "junk drawer number seven."
translation.zh: “厨房用具”“垃圾抽屉七号”

translation.en: I spent the next 21 days unpacking only the items I needed.
translation.zh: 在接下来的21天里我只拆箱取出了我需要的东西

translation.en: My toothbrush, my bed and bed sheets,
translation.zh: 我的牙刷、我的床和床单

translation.en: some clothes for work, the furniture I actually used,
translation.zh: 工作要穿的一些衣服我真正能用到的家具

translation.en: a tool set, some kitchenware.
translation.zh: 一套工具和一些厨房用具

translation.en: Just the things that added value to my life.
translation.zh: 就是那些可以给我的生活增添价值的东西

translation.en: After three weeks…
translation.zh: 三个星期后…

translation.en: I had 80% of my stuff still sitting in those boxes.
translation.zh: 我80%的东西还在那些盒子里

translation.en: Just sitting there, un-accessed.
translation.zh: 就放在那里 没被动过

translation.en: You know, I looked at those boxes… I couldn't even remember what was in most of 'em.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 我看着那些盒子 甚至都不记得多数盒子里面装的是什么了

translation.en: All those things I brought into my life to make me happy…
translation.zh: 这些东西的到来都是为了使我快乐…

translation.en: they weren't doing their job.
translation.zh: 但它们却没做到这一点

translation.en: So that's when I decided to let go. And you know what?
translation.zh: 于是当我决定处理掉它们的时候你知道吗？

translation.en: I started to feel free for the first time in my life.
translation.zh: 我生活中第一次感觉到自由 （捐赠）

translation.en: I got my time back.
translation.zh: 我找回了我的时间

translation.en: I got my life back.
translation.zh: 我找回了我的生活

translation.en: And as I changed my life,
translation.zh: 当我改变我的生活时

translation.en: I was focused on community, not consumerism.
translation.zh: 我注重的是群体 而不是消费

translation.en: Giving, not taking.
translation.zh: 给予 而不是获取

translation.en: People, not stuff.
translation.zh: 人 而不是物品

translation.en: It just made us really, you know, reassess our lives,
translation.zh: 极简主义让我们重新审视我们的生活

translation.en: reassess our goals and our commitments.
translation.zh: 重新评估我们的目标和责任

translation.en: Friends, and family, and colleagues have acknowledged a profound change in me.
translation.zh: 朋友、家人和同事都发现了我这个巨大的变化

translation.en: It's given me the opportunity
translation.zh: 极简主义给了我机会

translation.en: to be that person that I used to just talk about being.
translation.zh: 成为我过去想要成为的那个人

translation.en: Because of the way that my values have really been reorganized,
translation.zh: 因为我的价值观被重组

translation.en: I am grateful for every single second.
translation.zh: 我感激每一秒

translation.en: Really, I began to find myself again.
translation.zh: 真的 我开始重新找回自我

translation.en: And for that, I am so thankful.
translation.zh: 为此 我非常感激极简主义

translation.en: Minimalism…
translation.zh: 极简主义…

translation.en: it changed my life.
translation.zh: 改变了我的人生

translation.en: This emotion washed over me. You know, it was really overwhelming.
translation.zh: 这种情绪充斥着我这太让人难以置信了

translation.en: And it was this feeling of great abundance, you know.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 这是一种非常丰富的感觉

translation.en: Like an abundance where everything is fine.
translation.zh: 就像来到了一个一切都很美好的丰饶之地

translation.en: You have everything that you need, all is well. And I don't think I'd…
translation.zh: 你需要的东西都有了 一切都好我不认为我…

translation.en: I get emotional thinking back to it, right.
translation.zh: 我又找回到了情感上的思考
