translation.en: I don't think I had that feeling since I was maybe four or five years old, so…
translation.zh: 这种感觉 我记得在我四五岁之后就不曾拥有了 所以…

translation.en: This just deep knowing, you know, that all I wanted,
translation.zh: 这只是一种深刻的认识我想要的一切

translation.en: you know, all I was searching for, all I needed…
translation.zh: 我所寻找的一切 我所需要的一切…

translation.en: I already had it.
translation.zh: 我都拥有了

translation.en: [Ryan] A little over a year after my packing party experiment,
translation.zh: 在我的打包派对实验一年多后

translation.en: something unexpected happened.
translation.zh: 一些意外发生了

translation.en: My boss called me on a Friday morning
translation.zh: 我的老板在周五早上给我打电话

translation.en: and told me to drive down to Cincinnati that afternoon
translation.zh: 叫我下午开车去辛辛那提市

translation.en: to meet him at the company's Human Resources office.
translation.zh: 在公司的人力资源部见他

translation.en: I walked into the conference room and saw my boss
translation.zh: 我走进会议室 看到我的老板

translation.en: and someone from HR sitting on the other side of the conference table.
translation.zh: 和人力资源部的某位职员坐在会议桌的另一边

translation.en: My boss shook his head.
translation.zh: 老板摇了摇头

translation.en: "We've eliminated your position with the latest round of cuts," my boss said.
translation.zh: 说：“在最近一轮的裁员中我们决定裁掉你”

translation.en: "This change, it's effective immediately."
translation.zh: “这项决定立即生效”

translation.en: After seven promotions in less than a decade,
translation.zh: 在不到十年的时间里我经历了七次升职

translation.en: I was laid off with no notice.
translation.zh: 最终却在还没反应的时候就被解雇了

translation.en: And then I was surprised by my next thought.
translation.zh: 然后我对我的下一个想法感到惊讶

translation.en: "Isn't this the best thing that could have happened?"
translation.zh: “这难道不是发生在我身上最好的事情吗？”

translation.en: It was like a huge weight had been lifted off my shoulders.
translation.zh: 这就像是从我双肩卸下了巨大的重担

translation.en: I knew it was time for me to move on, and this was the nudge I needed.
translation.zh: 我知道是时候继续前进了这就是我需要的契机

translation.en: My entire perspective had changed.
translation.zh: 我的整个三观都改变了

translation.en: And then I thought to myself, "There might be some people out there
translation.zh: 然后我心想 “也许有人会从我的故事中发现价值

translation.en: who would find value in my story.
translation.zh: “也许有人会从我的故事中发现价值

translation.en: Who would find value in our story."
translation.zh: 会有人从我们的故事中发现价值”

translation.en: So Josh and I, we decided to do what any two 30-year-old dudes would do.
translation.zh: 因此乔休和我决定去做任何两个30岁的男人都会做的事

translation.en: We started a blog.
translation.zh: 我们决定运营一个博客

translation.en: That was a decade ago.
translation.zh: 那是十年前的事了

translation.en: And you know what? Something amazing happened.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？令人惊讶的事情发生了

translation.en: Fifty-two people visited our website in the first month.
translation.zh: 第一个月就有52人访问我们的网站

translation.en: I realize that might sound unremarkable at first, but Josh and I, we were excited.
translation.zh: 我知道一开始这听起来没什么了不起但乔休和我都很兴奋

translation.en: And then other remarkable things started happening.
translation.zh: 然后其他意想不到的事情开始发生了

translation.en: Fifty-two readers turned into 500, 500 turned into 5,000
translation.zh: 52名读者变成了500名500名又变成了5000名

translation.en: and now we have the privilege
translation.zh: 现在我们拥有了

translation.en: of sharing our message with millions of people every year.
translation.zh: 每年与数百万人分享我们消息的特权

translation.en: It turns out, when you add value to people's lives,
translation.zh: 事实证明当你为人们的生活增加价值时

translation.en: they're pretty eager to share your story with their friends and family
translation.zh: 他们非常渴望与他们的朋友和家人分享你的故事

translation.en: to add value to their lives.
translation.zh: 为他们的生活增添一点价值

translation.en: It's fitting that we're back here.
translation.zh: 我们回到这里再合适不过了

translation.en: Not just in Dayton, but here at Press, at this coffee shop,
translation.zh: 不只是在代顿市而且是在出版社 在这个咖啡店

translation.en: because this is where it literally started for us.
translation.zh: 因为对我们来说这就是它真正开始的地方

translation.en: Even back when we were in the corporate world,
translation.zh: 甚至当我们还在企业的时候

translation.en: you and I would meet here, and this was our place for creation.
translation.zh: 你和我会在这里见面这里就像是我们创作的地方

translation.en: It was almost like we required this extra space outside of the corporate world,
translation.zh: 就好像我们在公司之外在我们杂乱的个人生活之外

translation.en: outside of our cluttered personal lives,
translation.zh: 需要这个额外的空间

translation.en: to come here, to figure out how to create, how to simplify our lives.
translation.zh: 来到这里 去思考如何创造如何简化我们的生活

translation.en: To take this sort of feeling that we were experiencing
translation.zh: 来感受我们正在经历的这种感觉

translation.en: and get it down onto the page.
translation.zh: 并把它转化成文字 写在纸上

translation.en: [Erwin] I think we should all be allowed to Etch A Sketch our life and say,
translation.zh: 我认为我们都应该为自己的生活找一个新的开始 然后说

translation.en: "I thought this is the life I wanted, but it's not,
translation.zh: “我以为这是我想要的人生 但它不是

translation.en: and so I'm gonna start over again."
translation.zh: 因此我要重新开始”

translation.en: If you have a longing, and a dream, and a passion inside of you,
translation.zh: 如果你内心有渴望、梦想和激情

translation.en: why hold on to what you used to do and who you used to be
translation.zh: 为什么要坚持你过去做过的事和过去的自己

translation.en: and… and lose who you want to become?
translation.zh: 而放弃你将来想要成为的人？

translation.en: No matter where we're at on our journey towards less,
translation.zh: 无论我们在走向简约的旅程中处在哪里

translation.en: we are always going to be pulled in that direction.
translation.zh: 我们总是会被拉向那个方向

translation.en: The direction of comparison, the direction of being overwhelmed by the media.
translation.zh: 充满比较的方向 跟风媒体的方向

translation.en: And the truth is we have to constantly refocus ourselves.
translation.zh: 事实的真相是我们必须不断重新审视自己

translation.en: We make life unnecessarily complicated
translation.zh: 我们总把生活弄得 不必要的复杂

translation.en: because we overlook or underestimate
translation.zh: 因为我们忽视或低估了

translation.en: the… the sense of direction that can come
translation.zh: 因为我们忽视或低估了 可能就花一点时间独自坐下来就能得到的方向感

translation.en: from just taking a little time to sit alone with ourselves,
translation.zh: 可能就花一点时间独自坐下来就能得到的方向感

translation.en: to sit in the quiet and say,
translation.zh: 静静地坐着说

translation.en: "I'm not gonna get my ideas about what a good life is
translation.zh: “什么才是好生活 我不要让外界刺激

translation.en: from external sources of stimulation.
translation.zh: 影响我的看法

translation.en: I'm gonna listen to that inner voice and see where that's guiding me."
translation.zh: 我要倾听内心的声音看看它是如何指引我的”

translation.en: [Erwin] If people could just make a decision to be fully alive,
translation.zh: 如果人们能下定决心活得开心

translation.en: if they could just get rid of everything that's sucking the life out of their soul,
translation.zh: 如果人们能摆脱一切 那才是从他们的灵魂中吸取生命

translation.en: that's when you're gonna find your passion.
translation.zh: 那也正是找到你热情所在的时候

translation.en: But your passion will never be about yourself.
translation.zh: 但你的热情永远不会只关乎你自己

translation.en: Your passion will always be about some good you can do in the world.
translation.zh: 你的热情永远会是你能为这个世界做的一些好事

translation.en: That's why Josh and I are right here right now.
translation.zh: 这就是现在 我和乔休在这里的原因

translation.en: We really hope we can add value to your life
translation.zh: 我们真心希望能通过鼓励你们放手

translation.en: by encouraging you to let go.
translation.zh: 为你的生活增添价值

translation.en: To imagine a life with more.
translation.zh: 去描绘一个拥有更多的生活

translation.en: More time, more meaningful relationships,
translation.zh: 更多的时间 更多有意义的交际

translation.en: more growth, and contribution, and contentment.
translation.zh: 更多的成长、贡献和满足

translation.en: A life of passion,
translation.zh: 充满热情的生活

translation.en: unencumbered by the trappings of the chaotic world around you.
translation.zh: 不受周围混乱世界的纷扰

translation.en: What you're imagining is an intentional life.
translation.zh: 你所描绘的是一种有目标的生活

translation.en: Not a perfect life.
translation.zh: 而不是完美的生活

translation.en: Not even an easy life.
translation.zh: 也不是简单的生活

translation.en: But a simple one.
translation.zh: 而是简约的生活

translation.en: And to get there, you might have to let go of some stuff that's in the way.
translation.zh: 为了达到这个目标你可能必须要放弃一些阻碍你的东西

translation.zh: （接受“简约趁现在”挑战） （与一个朋友、家人、同事一起）

translation.en: ♪ Collect the memories We put them into frames ♪
translation.zh: （每人每天丢弃一件东西）

translation.en: ♪ The beauty of our day-to-day ♪
translation.zh: （第二天丢弃两件） （第三天丢弃三件）

translation.en: ♪ Hung on walls inside this home we built The life that we had made ♪
translation.zh: （以此类推） （全都可以舍弃！） （收藏品） （装饰物）

translation.zh: （动作玩偶、衣服毛巾、工具、帽子）

translation.zh: （捐赠、出售或回收） （所有物质财产都要在午夜前舍弃）

translation.zh: （你能坚持一整月吗？）

translation.zh: （分享你的进程）
